name: MetalBomber
description:
Walk through the maze, plant bombs, break crates to find power-ups to collect, and finish the level (currently 3 of them) by bombing the monsters.

WASD / Arrow keys - move

Space - plant bomb

Escape - pause

With a gamepad it's the left thumbstick, the action button X (Playstation stiyle) for planting bombs, and for pause.

Power-Ups are
- more bombs
- blast range
- player movement speed.

Current version is Lesson 204 with some bugfixes at the end of the course.

The Windows build is untested.
